title: Unmissable Family Holiday with Gourmet Inclusions and a World of Complimentary Activities
description: Discover a private paradise nestled in Fiji’s breathtaking Mamanuca Islands: the iconic Treasure Island, Fiji. Surrender to the island life as you enjoy a world of exclusive inclusions such as daily buffet breakfast, two dinners, a relaxing 15-minute foot ritual, a bottle of wine on arrival, an introductory pool dive lesson, a tour on board a semi-sub coral viewer, return airport transfers and so much more. Plus two kids aged 11 years and under stay, eat and play for free!

title: Unmissable Family Holiday with Daily Breakfast & Dinner and a World of Complimentary Activities
description: Discover a private paradise nestled in Fiji’s breathtaking Mamanuca Islands: the iconic Treasure Island, Fiji. Ideal for families, up to three children aged 11 years and under stay, play and eat free! Surrender to island life as you enjoy a world of exclusive inclusions such as daily buffet breakfast, nightly dinner, a relaxing 15-minute foot ritual per adult, an introductory pool dive lesson, one daily cocktail per adult, return airport transfers for the whole family and so much more.
offer_address: Treasure Island Resort, Treasure Island, Mamanuca region, Fiji

title: Iconic Family-Friendly Resort with Ocean Views
description: Discover an iconic private island nestled in Fiji’s breathtaking Mamanuca Islands. Stay in an Ocean View Bure only metres from the beach and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, welcome drinks, daily afternoon tea, complimentary canapes at Happy Hour, an invitation to a management cocktail party, nightly entertainment, complimentary activities and cultural programs including turtle feeding and all kids’ club sessions for two adults and up to two children.
offer_address: Treasure Island Resort, Treasure Island, Mamanuca Region, Fiji
